definition: abbr. for the Philippines 菲律賓|菲律宾[Fei1 lu:4 bin1]
woods/forest/CL:片[pian4]/circle(s) (i.e. specific group of people)/a collection (of similar things)

sentences.english: Dyco's Easy Loader is designed to easily lift and load Plastic Film Rolls.
sentences.chinese: 迪柯的裝載機易於擡起和輸出塑料菲林膠片。

sentences.english: I hope the X-ray machine doesn't damagew my film.
sentences.chinese: 我期望X光機不會保護我的菲林。

sentences.english: A single print or piece of film combining half-tone and line work.
sentences.chinese: 結合半色調網點和線條圖形的相片或菲林。

sentences.english: A right-reading negative film is required for making letterpress printing plate.
sentences.chinese: 制活版印刷用的電版，需要正讀負片菲林。

sentences.english: Welcome all digital and film users.
sentences.chinese: 歡迎所有用數碼機及菲林機的朋友。

sentences.english: Used as a stable overlay material and as a photographic film base.
sentences.chinese: 作覆面物料和照相菲林的片基用。

sentences.english: Colour transparency A full colour photographic positive on film.
sentences.chinese: 彩色透明片帶有全部色彩的陽圖菲林。

sentences.english: Do you develop black and white film?
sentences.chinese: 你們也衝曬黑白菲林的嗎？

sentences.english: McFerrin said bystanders converged on the scene trying to get a glimpse of the actor.
sentences.chinese: 麥克菲林說，旁觀者融合在現場試圖獲得一瞥演員。

sentences.english: Tony will introduce the features and functions of toy film camera to our alumni.
sentences.chinese: 林志堅先生將與各位校友介紹玩具菲林照相機的特色。

sentences.english: Microfilms can be used in projection plate-making systems.
sentences.chinese: 微攝菲林可以用於投影製版系統上。

definition: laser (loanword)/Taiwanese term for 激光[ji1 guang1]
to document on film the course of events/to follow sb with a camera
